description.en: Stadia is a cloud gaming service operated by Google. It is advertised to be capable of streaming video games up to 4K resolution at 60 frames per second with support for high-dynamic-range, to players via the company's numerous data centers across the globe, provided they are using a sufficiently high-speed internet connection. It is accessible through the Google Chrome web browser on desktop computers, Pixel smartphones, supported smartphones from Samsung, OnePlus, Razer and Asus, as well as Chrome OS tablets and Chromecast for TV support.
description.ga_IE: Is seirbhís cearrbhachais scamall é Stadia a fheidhmíonn Google.Fógraítear é a bheith in ann cluichí físeáin a shruthú suas le 4k réiteach ag 60 fráma in aghaidh an tsoicind le tacaíocht do raon ard-dhinimiciúil, do na himreoirí trí iliomad ionad sonraí ar fud na cruinne, ar choinníoll go bhfuil siad ag baint úsáide as idirlíon sách ard-luasceangal.Tá sé inrochtana tríd an Brabhsálaí Gréasáin Google Chrome ar ríomhairí deisce, fóin chliste picteilín, fóin chliste tacaíocht ó Samsung, OnePlus, Razer agus Asus, chomh maith le táibléad Chrome OS agus Chromecast do thacaíocht teilifíse.
